metadata.title: CVE-2020-5421 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In Spring Framework versions 5.2.0 - 5.2.8, 5.1.0 - 5.1.17, 5.0.0 - 5.0.18,4.3.0 - 4.3.28, and older unsupported versions, the protections against RFDattacks from CVE-2015-5211 may be bypassed depending on the browser usedthrough the use of a jsessionid path parameter.

criterions.comment: libspring-java package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
